Key:
Oh, Origami. Just as I thought, you're not always
holed up in the infirmary... right?

I don't know. But I do have memories of speaking
with you in the infirmary.

And I found it natural that I was always in there.
But then my consciousness suddenly drew back
and I found myself standing here.

I think what I experienced was different from a
dream... Maybe this being a virtual world has
something to do with it.

I-I see. But the scar I had earlier is gone...
How weird.
That is true. I'll look into this.
